name: Chieftain
firstNightReminder: :eye: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. :eye-slash:
otherNightReminder: :eye: If the clockhand is an Outsider, nod your head. Otherwise, shake your head. :eye-slash:
ability: You start knowing an in-play Outsider. Each night*, you learn if the clockhand is an Outsider. [+1 Outsider.]

name: Blasphemer
firstNightReminder: :eye: Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. :eye-slash:
otherNightReminder: :eye: They nod or shake their head. If they nodded and are the clockhand, the Blasphemer dies. :eye-slash:
ability: You start knowing an in-play Townsfolk. Each night*, choose yes or no: if you choose yes while you are the clockhand, you die.

name: Diviner
firstNightReminder: :eye: Point to a player that isn't the clockhand. Show the character token of the Demon in play. :eye-slash:
ability: You start knowing the in-play Demon & a player that isn’t the clockhand.

name: Trapper
firstNightReminder: :eye: They point to a player. Place the Tripwire reminder on that player. :eye - slash:
otherNightReminder: :eye: If the clockhand is the Trapper or the player with the Tripwire reminder, nod your head. Otherwise, shake your head. :eye-slash:
ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself). Each night*, you learn if either of you is the clockhand.

name: Poacher
otherNightReminder: :eye: If their target or their target's clockwise neighbor is the clockhand, nod your head. Otherwise, shake your head. :eye-slash:
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: you learn if they or their clockwise neighbor is the clockhand.

name: Stargazer
otherNightReminder: :eye: If the clockhand is good, give a thumbs up. If the clockhand is evil, give a thumbs down. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night*, you learn the clockhand’s alignment.

name: Soothsayer
otherNightReminder: :eye: They point to a player. If the clockhand is good, show them the chosen player's character token. If the clockhand is evil or the Soothsayer, show them any character token. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night*, choose a player: you learn their character. If the clockhand is evil or yourself, you are drunk.

name: Bloodletter
otherNightReminder: :eye: They point to a player or shake their head. If they pointed to a player: give them a thumbs up if the chosen player is good, thumbs down if evil, then you may bloody a player. :eye-slash:
ability: A Townsfolk starts bloodied. Each night*, you may choose a player: you learn their alignment and a player might be bloodied.

name: Stalker
firstNightReminder: :eye: If their clockwise living neighbor is a Minion, nod your head. Otherwise, shake your head. :eye-slash:
otherNightReminder: :eye: If their clockwise living neighbor is a Minion, nod your head. Otherwise, shake your head. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night, you learn if your clockwise living neighbor is a Minion.

name: Ambusher
firstNightReminder: :eye: Show the character token of a Minion in play. :eye-slash:
otherNightReminder: If the Ambusher died this night: :eye: Point to a Minion player. :eye-slash:
ability: You start knowing an in-play Minion. If you die at night, you learn a Minion player.

name: Warrior
otherNightReminder: :eye: If the Warrior is bloodied, nod your head. Otherwise, shake your head. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night*, you learn if you are bloodied. You are triaged at night.

name: Medicine Man
otherNightReminder: :eye: They point to two players. Place a Triaged reminder on both until dawn. :eye - slash:
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players (not yourself): they are triaged tonight.

name: Reveler
ability: Once per game, during the day, you may sing a song that makes the Demon & another player drunk until dawn.

name: Wicked
otherNightReminder: If the Wicked is the clockhand: :eye: Point to the Wicked and give them a thumbs down. Place the Evil reminder on the Wicked. Wake the Demon and show them the Wicked character token and point to the Wicked player. :eye-slash:
ability: If you become the clockhand, you turn evil & the Demon learns who you are.

name: Urchin
otherNightReminder: If they are struck in any order, wake the demon: they nod or shake their head, if they nodded, skip the clockhand.
ability: The 1st time you become the clockhand, the Demon is woken & may skip it. You start bloodied.

name: Right Hand Man
ability: While your clockwise neighbor is dead, a player is drunk.

name: Apiarist
otherNightReminder: If the Apiarist died today: either kill a player or bloody three players
ability: If you die, either a player dies, or 3 players are bloodied, tonight.

name: Eclipse
firstNightReminder: :eye: Point to a Townsfolk player. Place the Poisoned Target reminder on that Townsfolk. :eye-slash:
otherNightReminder: If they or their target are struck (for the 1st time) in any order, wake the Eclipse: they nod or shake their head, if they nodded, skip the clockhand.
ability: You start knowing & poison a Townsfolk player. The 1st time you or they become the clockhand, you may skip it.

name: Viceroy
firstNightReminder: :eye: Show the Grimoire. They nod or shake their head. If they nodded, place the Poisoned reminder on their clockwise living Townsfolk neighbor until dusk. :eye-slash:
otherNightReminder: :eye: Show the Grimoire. They nod or shake their head. If they nodded, place the Poisoned reminder on their clockwise living Townsfolk neighbor until dusk. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire & may choose to poison your clockwise living Townsfolk neighbor until dusk.

name: Effigy
otherNightReminder: :eye: They nod or shake their head. If they nodded, they die. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night*, choose yes or no: if you choose yes, you die. [+1 Outsider]

name: Secondhand
otherNightReminder: :eye: They point to a player. If that player is the clockhand, they die. Otherwise, that player is bloodied. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they are bloodied. Chosen clockhands die instead.

name: Retrogradus
firstNightReminder: Place the Poisoned reminder on a player of your choosing.
otherNightReminder: :eye: They point to a player. That player dies. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On your 1st night, a player is poisoned until dusk. [The clockhand moves counterclockwise]

name: Bogman
otherNightReminder: :eye: They point to a player. That player dies. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The clockhand & the clockhand’s clockwise neighbor are poisoned if they’re Townsfolk.

name: Sasquatch
otherNightReminder: :eye: They point to one or two players. They cannot point to two if they have a Used reminder. Those players die. If they pointed to two players, place the Used reminder on the Sasquatch. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Once per game, you may choose twice.

name: Wendigo
otherNightReminder: :eye: They point to one or three players. If they chose one, that player dies. If they chose three, those players are bloodied. :eye-slash:
ability: Each night*, choose 1 or 3 players: if you chose 1, they die; if you chose 3, they are bloodied. Minions start bloodied.

name: Clockhand
ability: Not a Demon, just a Clockhand reminder.

name: Bloodying
ability: Not a Demon, just Bloodied reminders.
